Noob question of the day.  How do I get the 001, 002, etc archive files together?  I tried using HJSplit but it made a file without an extension and I don't know what it's supposed to be.

This isn't just trailers, it's an HD video interview of the Crysis team talking about development. There is also a few other interesting videos as well. Though I think the size is a little overkill on the WMVHD vid, I found it to be worth the download.
